top_categories.workout_context: Sagan Fondo's California Sierra Nevada/Tahoe, Mountain gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 75 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Sagan Fondo's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before June.
93ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
7,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
At Sagan Fondo, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Sagan Fondo. Train it until it feels boring.
75 miles on California Sierra Nevada/Tahoe gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
7,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Sagan Fondo, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Base fitness for Sagan Fondo. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on California Sierra Nevada/Tahoe gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Sagan Fondo’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Sagan Fondo. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Sagan Fondo requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on california sierra nevada/tahoe gravel to build confidence. Expect: california sierra nevada/tahoe, mountain gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and TT Threshold to prepare you for 75 miles of california sierra nevada/tahoe gravel in Truckee, California.
